title: Fact Check: Mock drill video by Barabanki police is being shared as a Coronavirus positive case | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared on social media that claims to show how doctors and medical experts deal with a person who has contracted COVID-19.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above video and found that the claim attached to the video is FAKE.

When we extracted the keyframes of the video through InVid and put them through Reverse Image Search, we found a tweet by Barabanki Police on their official handle dated March 28, 2020, which features the same video.

The tweet read: “For the prevention of Novel Coronavirus, mock drills and necessary guidelines were given to the concerned by Superintendent of Barabanki Police in Deva Tiraha, Barabanki. 1/2 @Uppolice @adgzonelucknow @igrangeayodhya @News18UP” (Translated)

This conclusively proves that the video being shared is of a mock drill and hence, the claim is false.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
